title: Namal Rajapaksa resigns from ministerial portfolios
body_lines: Sri Lanka’s Cabinet Minister of Youth and Sports Namal Rajapaksa has resigned from all his ministerial portfolios.
The SLPP parliamentarian had served as the Minister of Youth & Sports, Minister of Development Co-ordination and Monitoring and the State Minister of Digital Technology and Enterprise Development.
Accordingly, he has stepped down from all the ministerial portfolios held by him.
